## Buckets.pullPath() method

Pulls the bucket path, returning the bytes of the given file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pullPath(key: string, path: string, ctx?: ContextInterface, opts?: {
        progress?: (num?: number) => void;
    }): AsyncIterableIterator<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Unique (IPNS compatible) identifier key for a bucket. |
|  path | string | A file/object (sub)-path within a bucket. |
|  ctx | ContextInterface | Context object containing web-gRPC headers and settings. |
|  opts | { progress?: (num?: number) =&gt; void; } | Options to control response stream. Currently only supports a progress function. |

<b>Returns:</b>

AsyncIterableIterator&lt;Uint8Array&gt;
